title: Instrument Base Fields
description: Base fields common to all financial instruments

securityCategory.description: The security category represents the third level of market classification in the post-trading process
securityCategory.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalSecurityCategoryCode

cfiCode.description: Classification of Financial Instruments code - ISO 10962 standard

paymentType.description: Identifies the settlement method for the trade
paymentType.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalPaymentTypeCode

tradingStartDate.description: Date when trading of the financial instrument begins

tradingEndDate.description: Date when trading of the financial instrument ends

tradingCurrency.description: Currency code in which the instrument is traded
tradingCurrency.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalActiveOrHistoricCurrencyCode

expirationDate.description: Date when the instrument expires or matures

valueTypeCode.description: Identifier code for the presentation form of the economic indicator
valueTypeCode.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalValueTypeCode

conversionCriteria.description: Type of conversion criteria, for example, linear, exponential, not available
conversionCriteria.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalConversionCriteriaTypeCode

optionStyle.description: Specifies how an option can be exercised (American, European, etc.)
optionStyle.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalOptionStyle

optionType.description: Specifies whether the option is a call or put
optionType.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalOptionType
